mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, role, created_at, updated_at FROM admin_user WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, username, password, role, created_at, updated_at FROM admin_user WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, username, password, role, created_at, updated_at FROM admin_user ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_user (username, password, role, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{role}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE admin_user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, role = #{role}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
